synopsis.text:
As a high school student, Seiichi Hiiragi was constantly tormented by his peers, branded as a 'loser.' However, when his school is mysteriously transported to a fantastical realm of magic and swords, Seiichi's life takes an extraordinary turn. Consuming the 'Fruit of Evolution' propels him on a path of power and success.

His newfound abilities attract the attention of Barnabus Ablitt, principal of the prestigious Barbador Academy of Magic, who extends an invitation for Seiichi to join the faculty. Little does Seiichi know, his former classmates from Earth are also students at the academy, setting the stage for an uncomfortable reunion.

Amidst the academy's daily life filled with vibrant teachers, eccentric students, and Seiichi's unique teaching methods, a nefarious cult known as The Great Devil Order plots to revive their deity. The students of Barbador are their intended sacrifices to expedite the resurrection.

With the world hanging in the balance, Seiichi must confront his past, protect his friends, and challenge the encroaching darkness. Will he rise to the occasion and become the hero everyone needs?
